attributes.action: keep the current laws banning motorcycles, scooters, and taxis from bus and cycle lanes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The primary purpose of bus lanes is to allow buses to avoid traffic congestion, making them more likely to run on time.  The secondary purpose of bus lanes is to make pedal cycling safer by allowing pedal cyclists to avoid heavy traffic;  their slow speed makes them very vulnerable to getting sideswiped by motor vehicles overtaking too closely and getting sucked into the slipstream of passing large vehicles.

Allowing motorcycles, taxis, and scooters into bus lanes will put congestion into bus lanes, negating their primary purpose.  Allowing large numbers of fast-moving, and—in the case of powered-two-wheelers—small and therefore harder to see, vehicles into bus lanes will negate their secondary purpose.

In the interests of better public transport and safer self-powered transport, powered-two-wheelers and taxis must be kept out of bus lanes.
